mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, TEL, CREATEDAT, UPDATEDAT) VALUES(member_id_seq.nextval,#{loginId},#{password},#{memberName},#{email},#{tel},sysdate,sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS T FROM MEMBER WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{loginId}
